name: Sparkle heels
description: These shoes are a brilliant find! They are a size 4.5 (37.5) and are made from a great reflective snake skin type fabric that shimmer a blue purple and green in the light, and are made by the Itallian designer Penata. As the shoes are vintage they have been worn and there is some slight evidence of this which you can see in the pictures below, but this being said there isn’t much wear on the sole of the shoe at all, so theres enough grip to make sure you can boogie all day and night without slipping! Would look great with any other vintage clothing or even with new fashions to give them a retro twist!

name: hot dang shades.
description:
Vintage 1980s neon pink sunglasses, very good quality and condition, in original packaging!
The shades have a really stylish mirrored effect to the lenses adding a bit more interest to them.
A brilliant find and would look great with any other neon, club, rave or beach wear, especially as summer is just round the corner!
